description: Returns a list of all the connectors in this account and Region. The list is limited to connectors whose name starts with the specified prefix. The response also includes a description of each of the listed connectors.

nested_items.name: connectors
nested_items.description: An array of connector descriptions.

nested_items.name: autoScaling
nested_items.description: Describes the connector's auto scaling capacity.

nested_items.name: maxWorkerCount
nested_items.description: The maximum number of workers allocated to the connector.

nested_items.name: mcuCount
nested_items.description: The number of microcontroller units (MCUs) allocated to each connector worker. The valid values are 1,2,4,8.

nested_items.name: minWorkerCount
nested_items.description: The minimum number of workers allocated to the connector.

nested_items.name: scaleInPolicy
nested_items.description: The sacle-in policy for the connector.

nested_items.name: cpuUtilizationPercentage
nested_items.description: Specifies the CPU utilization percentage threshold at which you want connector scale in to be triggered.

nested_items.name: scaleOutPolicy
nested_items.description: The sacle-out policy for the connector.>

nested_items.name: cpuUtilizationPercentage
nested_items.description: The CPU utilization percentage threshold at which you want connector scale out to be triggered.

nested_items.name: provisionedCapacity
nested_items.description: Describes a connector's provisioned capacity.

nested_items.name: mcuCount
nested_items.description: The number of microcontroller units (MCUs) allocated to each connector worker. The valid values are 1,2,4,8.

nested_items.name: workerCount
nested_items.description: The number of workers that are allocated to the connector.

nested_items.name: connectorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the connector.

nested_items.name: connectorDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the connector.

nested_items.name: connectorName
nested_items.description: The name of the connector.

nested_items.name: connectorState
nested_items.description: The state of the connector.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time that the connector was created.

nested_items.name: currentVersion
nested_items.description: The current version of the connector.

nested_items.name: kafkaCluster
nested_items.description: The details of the Apache Kafka cluster to which the connector is connected.

nested_items.name: apacheKafkaCluster
nested_items.description: The Apache Kafka cluster to which the connector is connected.

nested_items.name: bootstrapServers
nested_items.description: The bootstrap servers of the cluster.

nested_items.name: securityGroups
nested_items.description: The security groups for the connector.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: subnets
nested_items.description: The subnets for the connector.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: kafkaClusterClientAuthentication
nested_items.description: The type of client authentication used to connect to the Apache Kafka cluster. The value is NONE when no client authentication is used.

nested_items.name: authenticationType
nested_items.description: The type of client authentication used to connect to the Apache Kafka cluster. Value NONE means that no client authentication is used.

nested_items.name: kafkaClusterEncryptionInTransit
nested_items.description: Details of encryption in transit to the Apache Kafka cluster.

nested_items.name: encryptionType
nested_items.description: The type of encryption in transit to the Apache Kafka cluster.

nested_items.name: kafkaConnectVersion
nested_items.description: The version of Kafka Connect. It has to be compatible with both the Apache Kafka cluster's version and the plugins.

nested_items.name: logDelivery
nested_items.description: The settings for delivering connector logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs.

nested_items.name: workerLogDelivery
nested_items.description: The workers can send worker logs to different destination types. This configuration specifies the details of these destinations.

nested_items.name: cloudWatchLogs
nested_items.description: Details about delivering logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Whether log delivery to Amazon CloudWatch Logs is enabled.

nested_items.name: logGroup
nested_items.description: The name of the CloudWatch log group that is the destination for log delivery.

nested_items.name: deliveryStream
nested_items.description: The name of the Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream that is the destination for log delivery.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether connector logs get delivered to Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose.

nested_items.name: bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the S3 bucket that is the destination for log delivery.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether connector logs get sent to the specified Amazon S3 destination.

nested_items.name: prefix
nested_items.description: The S3 prefix that is the destination for log delivery.

nested_items.name: plugins
nested_items.description: Specifies which plugins were used for this connector.

nested_items.name: customPlugin
nested_items.description: Details about a custom plugin.

nested_items.name: customPluginArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the custom plugin.

nested_items.name: revision
nested_items.description: The revision of the custom plugin.

nested_items.name: serviceExecutionRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role used by the connector to access Amazon Web Services resources.

nested_items.name: workerConfiguration
nested_items.description: The worker configurations that are in use with the connector.

nested_items.name: revision
nested_items.description: The revision of the worker configuration.

nested_items.name: workerConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the worker configuration.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the response of a ListConnectors operation is truncated, it will include a NextToken. Send this NextToken in a subsequent request to continue listing from where it left off.
